Sentencas: A pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system (SOFC-GT system) has been received much attention for a distributed power generation due to its high efficiency.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: When considering an energy management of the system, it is found that a heat input is highly required to preheat air before being fed to the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The recirculation of a high-temperature cathode exhaust gas is probably an interesting option to reduce the requirement of an external heat for the SOFC-GT system.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: This study aims to analyze the pressurized SOFC-GT hybrid system fed by ethanol with the recycle of a cathode exhaust gas via a simulation study.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: Effect of important operating parameters on the electrical efficiency and heat management of the system is investigated.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The results indicate that an increase in the operating pressure dramatically improves the system electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The suitable pressure is in a range of 4-6 bar, achieving the highest system electrical efficiency and the lowest recuperation energy from the waste heat of the GT exhaust gas.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: In addition, it is found that the waste heat obtained from the GT is higher than the heat required for the system, leading to a possibility of the SOFC GT system to be operated at a self-sustainable condition.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation

Sentencas: Under a high pressure operation, the SOFC-GT system requires a high recirculation of the cathode exhaust gas to maintain the system without supplying the external heat; however, the increased recirculation ratio of the cathode exhaust gas reduces the system electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Analysis of a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid power system with cathode gas recirculation
